modName: Realistic Carry Weight and Item Value Economy Overhaul
summary: Changes the weight and item values of nearly all items.
descriptionHtml:
SELLING IRON DAGGERS! ONLY 5 LBS! IRON SWORDS ONLY 11 LBS!

What\'s that? You want to give me a once in a lifetime offer to buy an item of legendary existence bestowed upon you by the daedric prince Azura herself? Meh, I\'ll take it for 400 coins, no more than that.




This mod changes the weight and item values of nearly all items to realistic values.

Changes can be seen https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0Ajw5xLXfCiC3dFB4RWVkeVh6ZnBDQXlDYWdaeUd1TXc#gid=0

Uses kryptopyr Armor & Weapon Fixes as base.

[v1.0] 1104.19JUN2013
===============================================================
Uses kryptopyr Armor & Weapon Fixes as base.
Adds weights and values to all weapons, but staves.
Adds weights and values to all armor and clothes but divine amulets, nonplayable clothes and armor, amulet of articulation.
Renames several armor sets to match appearance (ie. gauntlets to bracers) and to allow better sorting (ie. forsworn garments of the old gods).
Adds weights and values to all misc., soul gems.

Feature creep: Quest weapons (ie. _____\'s Sword) have been changed to match lore better.

Roggi\'s Ancestral Shield (Iron to Targe)
Queen Freydis\'s Sword (Steel to Nord Hero)**
All Wedding Bands (Gold Ring or Silver Ring to Gold Diamond Ring)
Noster\'s Helmet (Imperial Light Helmet to Imperial Helmet (Closed))
Rename Harrald\'s Sword (Steel Sword to Harrald\'s Steel Sword)
Amren\'s Family Sword (Iron Sword to Scimitar)*
Ghorbash\'s Ancestral Axe (Iron Axe to Orcish Axe) (Cut from game)
Balgruuf\'s Greatsword (Iron Greatsword to Nord Hero Greatsword)

*Amren is a Redguard, moved in from Cyrodiil. His father made money with the weapon to feed his entire family.
** Oeungul War-Anvil specifically states that Queen Freydis had a legendary sword, in the old style. It has been changed to a Nord Hero Sword enchanted with x6 frost.

To Do:
===============================================================
Divine Amulets
Amulet of Articulation
All Potions
All Books


Books are untouched because I am indecisive at the moment on how to weight them. Real books in the medieval era were expensive. The Bible would weigh in at 8lb, take 15 months to write, and cost around 670, absolutely unaffordable by the common man.

Potions and their values are tied directly to raising their skill value and will not be touched.

Enchanted gear are too numerous and would cause mod bloat, and will not be touched.


Compatibility
===============================================================
Not compatible with any other item overhaul. Weapon and Armor Fixes by kryptopyr is included in this release, therefore is redundant and not compatible.
This should be placed high in the load order, preferably after Unofficial Skyrim Patches.
